# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position unknown) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Burner mining drills and burners require fuel to operate.
- Ensure that the fuel is available and accessible.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it.
- The steam engine requires a connection to a power network to operate.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump has a pipe connection before attempting to use it.
- The offshore pump requires a pipe connection to operate.

### Errors when using electricity group
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to use it.
- The electricity group requires a connection to an electric network to operate.

### Errors when using belt group
- Ensure that the belt group is not empty before attempting to use it.
- The belt group requires items to transport to operate.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
